product_service_information.core_offering_description: Low FODMAP, gluten-free, allergy-friendly packaged food products
product_service_information.unique_selling_proposition: Delicious, easy to digest food for people with stomach issues
product_service_information.development_stage: Retail outlet and cafe in Melbourne, packaged products, wholesale distribution starting

positive_responses: Andrew saying 'you guys have convinced me'

deal_breakers: Andrew's initial hesitation due to numbers

Vision to be the largest specialty food brand
